attributes.action: appoint Paul Moore to fill the vacancy in the position of Vice-Chair at the FSA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paul Moore, an ex-whistle blower at HBOS, until he was sacked, clearly has skills useful to the UK in the situation we are now in. The sooner he is appointed to fill the vacancy the sooner we will have the use of his undoubted expertise.
